title: Textile, 1920s
medium:
Medium: rayon (?) and silk
Technique: Stenciled or block printed on jacquard weave. 4 & 1 satin with alternate wefts (yellow and black) making long floats as pattern requires.
dimensions: Warp x Weft: 99 x 65 cm (39 x 25 9/16 in.)
description: Woven and stencilled, shaded arches with flowers.

tombstone.epitaph:
Textile, 1920s.
1920s. Medium: rayon (?) and silk
Technique: Stenciled or block printed on jacquard weave. 4 & 1 satin with alternate wefts (yellow and black) making long floats as pattern requires.. Gift of Mrs. Germaine Little. 1968-110-188.
